results.title: Early Treatment With Metformin in a Mice Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome Reduces Pain and Edema.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ also reversed burrowing deficits compared to saline-treated @<m>DISEASE_Tibial_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013978 @@@tibial fracture@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ (difference of mean area under the curve, 546 g d; 95% CI of the difference, 68-1024; P < .022).

citations.NLM: Das V, Kroin JS, Moric M, McCarthy RJ, Buvanendran A. Early Treatment With Metformin in a Mice Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome Reduces Pain and Edema. Anesth Analg. 2020 Feb;130(2):525-534. PMID: 30801357
